character.age: Aged 852, appears to be in mid-30s due to elven longevity
character.role: Rogue and member of a secretive organization known as the Veiled Hand
character.background: Eira was born into a noble Night Elf family but rejected her privileged upbringing to pursue a life of stealth and deception. She honed her skills in the dark alleys of major cities before joining the Veiled Hand.
character.place-of-birth: Zin-Azshari, the ancient capital of the Night Elves
